statements: DELETE FROM judicial_outcomes WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
DELETE FROM gender_violence_cases WHERE case_id = 1001 AND victim_gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM judicial_outcomes WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court' AND outcome = 'Appeal Denied';
DELETE FROM CaseLocations WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM CaseLocations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
DELETE FROM Perpetrators WHERE perpetrator_age > 40 AND case_id IN (SELECT case_id FROM GenderViolenceCases WHERE outcome = 'Convicted');
